mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.user_id AS "user.id", a.code AS "code", a.name AS "name", a.name_pinyin as "namePinyin", a.phone_number AS "phoneNumber", a.sex AS "sex", a.industry_id AS "industryId", a.post_id AS "postId", a.birthday AS "birthday", a.organ_id AS "organId", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.owner AS "owner", a.package_id AS "packageId", a.package_price AS "packagePrice", a.id_number AS "idNumber", a.status AS "status", a.item_type AS "itemType", u2.name AS "user.name"

a.id AS "id", a.user_id AS "userId", a.code AS "code", a.name AS "name", a.phone_number AS "phoneNumber", a.sex AS "sex", a.industry_id AS "industryId", a.post_id AS "postId", a.birthday AS "birthday", a.organ_id AS "organId", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.create_by AS "createById", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateById", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.owner AS "owner", a.package_id AS "packageId", a.package_price AS "packagePrice", a.id_number AS "idNumber", a.status AS "status", a.item_type AS "itemType", u2.name AS "userName", o2.name AS "organName", d3.label AS "sexLabel"
LEFT JOIN bj_examination_user u2 ON u2.id = a.user_id
LEFT JOIN bj_examination_user u2 ON u2.id = a.user_id LEFT JOIN bj_organ o2 ON o2.id = a.organ_id LEFT JOIN sys_dict d3 ON d3.value = a.sex and d3.type='sex' and d3.del_flag='0'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bj_examination_record( id, user_id, code, name, name_pinyin, phone_number, sex, industry_id, post_id, birthday, organ_id, del_flag, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, owner, package_id, package_price, id_number, status, item_type ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{user.id}, #{code}, #{name},#{namePinyin}, #{phoneNumber}, #{sex}, #{industryId}, #{postId}, #{birthday}, #{organId}, #{delFlag}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{owner}, #{packageId}, #{packagePrice}, #{idNumber}, #{status}, #{itemType} )
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM bj_examination_record a
a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL} and (a.upload_date is null or a.upload_date < a.update_date )
limit 100
